system.description: The character weaves an inky mist that can attack those inside it.
system.effect: The character creates an inky mist for up to 25 spaces per rank around them that blocks all line of sight beyond 5 spaces. On later turns, the character can have the mist attacks one target at a time, Make an Egp check against the target's Vigilance defense. On a success, the attack does regular damage. On a Fantastic success, it does double damage and blinds the target for one turn.
